name: Oh No! It's An Alien Invasion: The Ruins Below
name_original: Oh No! It's An Alien Invasion: The Ruins Below
description:
SURVIVE THE DANGEROUS RUINS BELOW AND TAKE BACK YOUR SECRET BASE!

The Brainlings have attacked the Swell-Mart leaving you with only one option: Go to the Ruins Below!

Defeat all the Brainlings in this frantic dungeon crawler where the action never stops! Use powerful weapons to defeat all the Brainlings in each room. Collect useful items like weapon upgrades, bombs, and powerups along the way. Be prepared for the final boss battle at the end of each level!

• Play as Nate, Lily or Jumbo Ninja
• Survive the Ruins Below and take back your hideout!
• Watch out for enemy traps, cheese monsters, and bombs!
• Upgrade weapons like the Water Blaster, Meatball Gun, and Megazooka
• Fight challenging bosses like Megaling, Brainling Ball, and Briiian!
